Uue teemana on aga päevakorda kerkinud tsetsekärbes, kelle hammustusega levib unitõbi, mis on paljude loomade ja inimese jaoks surmav. Neid kärbseid on siin enam kui küllaga, aga loodusvaated lummavad ja nii ununeb see tüütu putukas peagi. Aafrikas seiklesid Peeter Vähi ja Tiina Jokinen.

programme.title: Kaltsuneiu
programme.desc: Kuus aastat hiljem on Milliest sirgunud kaunis noor naine, keda Aggie ja Ben paaniliselt maailma eest kaitsevad. Millie saab maakohas tööd lapsehoidjana, ent taas sunnivad probleemid teda koju naasma.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Eesti kaitseväe ajateenijate väljaõppesse kuulub ka loodustarkuste omandamine ja toimetulek looduses. Sõduri ülesanne on jääda looduses nähtamatuks - milliste nippidega seda saavutada? Talvises metsalaagris omandatud oskused ja looduskogemus viib nii mõnegi noore loodusega sina peale. Milline on tänavune hülgekevad? Küsime seda hülgeuurijatelt Mart ja Ivar Jüssilt. Teeme kaasa hüljeste poegimisaegse seire Innarahul ja Laevarahul. Karvasjalg-kakk on öise eluviisiga väike kakuline, kellel pikkust vaid 25 cm. Päeval peidab ta end tihedasse kuusevõrasse või puuõõnesse. Veebruarist alates võib tuulevaiksel ööl karvasjalg-kaku laulu kuulda mitmete kilomeetrite kauguselt. Autorid Kristo Elias, Sander Loite, Tarmo Mikussaar. Režissöör Keiti Väliste, operaatorid Madis Reimund ja Tarmo Mikussaar, helirežissöör Taisto Uuslail, toimetaja-produtsent Õie Arusoo.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: "Plekktrummi" stuudios süttivad tuled, et jätkata vestlusi inimestega, kes on ennast pühendanud kultuuri kujundamisele ja mõtestamisele. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Täna näitavad arstid, kuidas drooniga mägedes elusid päästetakse, laboris toimub aga tõeline pidu ja pillerkaar!

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Sõbrad lähevad aardejahile. Aaret valvavad merineitsi ja kuldne merekoletis.

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Oktonaudid jälitavad elukat, kes teeb nende seadmetesse suuri ja veidraid auke. Selgub, et tegemist on lõikurhaiga.

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Nöps küpsetab nii maitsva tordi, et Mikk tahab seda kõigile müüma hakata. Tellimusi tuleb aga nii palju, et kohviku köögis valitseb kohutav segadus ja kõik tordid tulevad välja isemoodi. Nüüd peab Nöps leidma sobiva süsteemi, et kõikide klientide soovid täita.

programme.title: Priit ja Prääks
programme.desc: Mereröövlid lasevad aardekirstust välja Fantoomi, kes vallutab nende laeva ja põgeneb koos varandusega. Nüüd peab Priit mereröövlid päästma ja nendega kampa lööma, enne kui Fantoom kogu raamatu hävitab!

programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine
programme.desc: Ernest ootab vanaema külla ja tahab viia ta restorani, kuhu vanaisa kunagi ammu vanaema esimesele kohtamisele viis. Paraku tuleb nii peenes kohas kanda lipsu ja ilmutada häid kombeid...

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Džungliässadelt otsib abi üks õnnetu tuukanipaar, kes on oma muna krokodillisoosse pillanud.

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Mis teha, kui sulistamisbassein on tühi, aga vihmapilvi pole kuskil näha? Väike Printsess ja Professor otsustavad minna ise pilvi püüdma.

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Käes on nädalalõpp ja korraga ei toimi koolis ükski loits. Baba-Jagaa ilmub kohale ja pakub oma abi.

programme.title: Mängime arsti
programme.desc: Vahva ja hariv minisari 6-9-aastastele lastele, milles selgitatakse lihtsal ning näitlikul viisil enamlevinud haiguste olemust ja sümptomite avaldumisvorme.

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Jänes Ricardo otsib "Romeo ja Julia" etenduse jaoks sobivat Julia osatäitjat. Cynthiat süüdistatakse esinemisproovi ärarikkumises, kuid tegelikult on kõige taga pilalind, kes teisi esinejaid järele aimab.

programme.title: Saara ja part
programme.desc: Saara ja Part vaatavad tähti, ent imekombel ilmub öösel välja vikerkaar.

programme.title: Arva ära, kui palju ma sind armastan. Jõuluseiklus
Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare - Christmas to the Moon and Back
programme.desc: Väike pähkelpruun jänku satub jõulude ajal seiklusesse - ta eksib metsa ära, kuid teeb kõik, et veeta jõulud koos oma lähedastega.

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Koolivaheaeg on läbi ja Saara peab tagasi kooli minema, kuid enne seda ootab Tsentoopia päästmist. Viks ja Gargoona on sepitsenud kavala plaani. Kas Saaral õnnestub viimasel hetkel Tsentoopia süda kokku saada?

programme.title: Äkki õnnestub
A vdrug polutšitsa
programme.desc: Lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Selles saates näete, kui erakordne on inimkeha! Xand tunneb tänase katse pärast muret, sest ei usu, et labor on ajusiirdamise jaoks õige koht. Ronx sõidab taas kiirabibrigaadis.

programme.title: Ellujäämisheitlus
programme.desc: Partlane valgesilm-vart ehk ruskevart on Lääne- ja Kesk-Euroopas haruldaseks jäänud. Kunagi elas ta Põhja-Saksamaal Steinhude järve ääres, kuid viimastel aastakümnetel on ta piirkonnast kadunud. Käimas on projekt valgesilm-vardi asurkonna taastamiseks Steinhude järve ümbruses. Looduskaitsealal paljundatakse ja kasvatatakse valgesilm-varte, kes hiljem lastakse loodusesse. Eesmärk on luua mõne aastaga selline asurkond, mis suudab ise, ilma inimeste poolse sekkumiseta püsida, et valgesilm-vart võiks kord jälle olla kohalik liik.

programme.title: Berliin. Põgenemise kunst
Berlin, l’art de l’évasion
programme.desc: 2019. aastal möödus 30 aastat Berliini müüri langemisest. See 155 km pikkune rõngas Ida-Saksamaal Berliini ümber oli kõige läbipääsmatum takistus, mille inimene loonud. Siiski õnnestus müüri eksisteerimise ajal 1961-1989, vaatamata pidevale valvele ja surmaohule, üle 5000 inimesel sellest tõkkest läbi murda. Filmis näeme seni avaldamata kaadreid, mille Kanada operaator Patrice Massenet filmis kaks aastat enne müüri langemist ning kuuleme lugusid uskumatust vaprusest, leidlikkusest ja visadusest, mis aitas põgenikel vabadusse pääseda.

programme.title: PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool
programme.desc: Pimedate ööde filmifestivali säravaimad hetked ja põnevaimad uudised vallutavad ekraani.

programme.title: 4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja üheksandas osas jõuame tagasi Bulgaariasse ja leiame järvest kunagise kiriku varemed. Seejärel praamitame end üle Doonau Rumeeniasse ja suundume avastama vana vangilaagrit, mille väravad meile mingil põhjusel lahti tehakse. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Sissejuhatuse filmile "Sõjakaotused" teeb AK saatejuht Priit Kuusk.

programme.title: Sõjakaotused
Casualties of War
programme.desc: R: Brian De Palma. O: Michael J. Fox, Sean Penn. Väga erinevate filmižanritega töötava Ameerika režissööri Brian De Palma (1940) Vietnami sõja läbielamisi kujutav draama tõstis ta ühele pulgale selliste meisterlavastajatega nagu Stanley Kubrick („Full Metal Jacket”), Oliver Stone („Rühm”) ja Francis Ford Coppola („Tänapäeva apokalüpsis”). Vietnami džunglis redutav viieliikmeline ameeriklaste sõjarühm ihub tapetud relvavenna pärast vietkongidele kättemaksu ja röövib külakesest noore neiu. Sisuliselt seksiorjaks võetud tüdruku kaitseks julgeb välja astuda vaid kapral Eriksson (Fox), kes muutub seeläbi vägivaldse rühmapealiku (Penn) ja teiste kaaslaste silmis kodumaa reeturiks. Filmi muusika on kirjutanud eelmisel aastal meie seast lahkunud Ennio Morricone („Vihane kaheksa”).

programme.title: Meie teised
The Rest of Us
programme.desc: Delikaatne draama, mis käsitleb peresuhteid ootamatu nurga alt. Üksikema Cami (Heather Graham) ja tema neiueas tütar Aster (Sophie Nélisse) saavad teada Cami eksabikaasa surmast. Mehest jäi maha ka teine perekond, uus naine Rachel (Jodi Balfour) ja puberteedieas tütar Talulah (Abigail Pniowsky). Kuuldes, et Rachel ja Talulah jäid mehe surma järel majanduslikult kindlustamata, pakub Cami neile oma kodus peavarju. Olude sunnil võtab Rachel ettepaneku vastu ja vastuolude kaudu kokku saanud emade-tütarde kvartett saab võimaluse üksteist lähemalt tundma õppida. R: Aisling Chin-Yee.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Täna proovib printsess kätt leiutajana. Aga uute asjade väljamõtlemine on teadagi raske.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Printsess ja Algie teevad ajakapsli. Printsess ei mõista, mis asi see õigupoolest on.(n)

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Ben ja Holly külastavad mesilastaru, et näha, kuidas mesi valmib.(n)

programme.title: Tipsi ja Tim
programme.desc: Tipsi on ikka haiglas ja sobitab seal tutvust teiste lastega, samal ajal kontrollivad arstid ja õed, kuidas on lood tema tervisega.(n)

programme.title: Hei, turbod
programme.desc: Keset purjeregatti läheb ootamatult kaduma maailmakuulus Sydney ooperimaja. Kas asjaga on taas seotud Vanameister Vuss? Turbod tõttavad appi!(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Koolivaheaeg on läbi ja Saara peab tagasi kooli minema, kuid enne seda ootab Tsentoopia päästmist. Viks ja Gargoona on sepitsenud kavala plaani. Kas Saaral õnnestub viimasel hetkel Tsentoopia süda kokku saada?(n)

programme.title: TKKG - iga legend saab kusagilt alguse
TKKG - Jede Legende hat ihren Anfang
programme.desc: Kaks väga erinevat poissi – rikka vabrikandi poeg Willy, hüüdnimega Klimbike, ja vaestest oludest pärit Tim – kohtuvad uue õppeaasta algul uues koolis, mille internaadis paigutatakse nad ühte tuppa. Esialgu pole nende läbisaamine just lihtne, ent kui Willy isa röövitakse ja tahetakse lunaraha asemel hinnalist idamaist jumalakuju, on Tim ainus, kes jääb uskuma, et politsei on isa assistenti Georgi kahtlustades valedel jälgedel. Niisiis asub inimröövi lahendama 7c klassi uurimisrühm TKKG – Tim, Karl, Klimbike, Gaby. Viimase on poisid võtnud kampa sellepärast, et Gaby isa on politseinik ja isehakanud detektiivid loodavad, et tema kaudu saab ehk infot ametliku uurimise seisust. Nii nagu kriminaalsetes lugudes sageli, osutub kurjategijaks hoopis see, keda algul kahtlustadagi ei osata, noored detektiivid aga saavad koos tegutsedes headeks sõpradeks.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Selles saates näete, kui erakordne on inimkeha! Xand tunneb tänase katse pärast muret, sest ei usu, et labor on ajusiirdamise jaoks õige koht. Ronx sõidab taas kiirabibrigaadis.(n)

programme.title: Venemaa metsik loodus
programme.desc: Primorski krais kohtub maailma suurim ookean maailma suurima mandriga ja seal valitseb ainulaadne ilmastik. Hiiglaslik piirkond on pindalalt kaks korda suurem kui India. Põhjas näeme mägist taigat ja lõunas vihmametsa. Tohutuid metsamassiive läbivad puhtad jõed. See on looduslikult Venemaa kõige mitmekesisem ja rikkalikum paik.(n)

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Kui räägime rohelisemast tulevikust, siis enamasti mõtleme reostusvabast tuule- ja päikeseenergiast ning elektriautodest. Kõlab ju kenasti? Aga enamasti ei teata, tänu millele see kõik üldse võimalikuks saab. Vastu kõiki ootusi on selleks kaevandamine. Ka Eesti teadlased uurivad, kui palju leidub meie maapõues uute tehnoloogiate jaoks vältimatult vajalikke haruldasi muldmetalle. Saatejuht on Erle Loonurm ja saatesari valmib koostöös Eesti Teadusagentuuriga.(n)

programme.title: Bonus track
programme.desc: Sven Grünberg on helilooja, muusik, budistlik mõtleja, Dalai-laama maaletooja, isa – kui nimetada mõnd rolli tema elus. Muidugi on ta ka poeg, abikaasa, vend, õppejõud, inimene. Ta on isiksus oma väljakujunenud maailmavaatega. Vaatamata kokkupuudetele budismiga, on ta karmi ütlemisega mees, kes samas on oma seisukoha või hinnangu eest valmis ka vastutama. Mõne aasta eest elas Grünberg üle raske südameoperatsiooni ja hakkas elule teise pilguga vaatama. „Bonus track” portreteerib teda operatsioonijärgsel ajal, mil ta jätkuvalt loob uut muusikat, hoolitseb, et varasem looming saaks veatult talletatud, kasvatab oma eelkooliealist tütart ja korraldab juba kolmandat korda Tema Pühaduse XIV Dalai-laama vastuvõttu. Stsenaristid Margit Keerdo-Dawson ja Riho Västrik. Režissöör Riho Västrik, operaatorid Riho Västrik, jt, monteerija Lauri Laasik, helilooja Sven Grünberg, helirežissöör Ekke Västrik. Tootja OÜ Vesilind.(n)

programme.title: Milarepa laulud
programme.desc: Filmi aluseks on Tiibeti 11. sajandi kuulsaima luuletaja ja budismiõpetaja Milarepa looming. Tegelasteks on noor õpetlane (Sven Grünberg) ja üliõpilane (Kaja Soieva). Nad rändavad Burjaatia ja Mongoolia pühapaikades, teejuhiks Linnart Mäll, ning otsivad Milarepa filosoofia ja budistliku kultuuri kaudu teed iseendasse.(n)

programme.title: Hukkunud Alpinisti hotell
programme.desc: Vendade Strugatskite teose ainetel valminud teaduslik-fantastiline põnevusfilm inimeste kohtumisest tulnukatega teiselt planeedilt. Režissöör Grigori Kromanov, operaator Jüri Sillart, kunstnik Tõnu Virve, helilooja Sven Grünberg. Osades Uldis Pucitis, Jüri Järvet, Lembit Peterson, Mikk Mikiver, Karlis Sebris, Irena Kriauzaite, Sulev Luik, Tiit Härm, Nijole Ozelyte, Kaarin Raid. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.(n)

programme.title: Saada nägijaks
programme.desc: Neli kompositsiooni Sven Grünbergilt. Režissöör Jaanus Nõgisto.(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley - Rongiga Aasiast Euroopasse
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley sõidab läbi Siberi Moskva poole, kus ta viibis viimati 1966. aastal. Tema esimene peatus on Baikali järve ääres. Ta joob viina koos kohaliku kalamehega ja sõidab seejärel Krasnojarskisse, kus kohtub oligarhiga. Veel külastab ta sünge ajalooga Jekaterinburgi ja Stalini punkrit ning saab kokku vene modellidega.(n)

programme.title: Engel
programme.desc: Engel on häbelik ja kohmakas 11-aastane tüdruk, kes ei suuda kunagi „ei“ öelda. Ühel päeval koju minnes juhtub temaga midagi kummalist - ta komistab, aga näoli kukkumise asemel hõljub äkitselt ilusas seebimullis. Kui mull katki läheb ja Engel on uimasena maas, leiab ta enda kõrvalt ilusa käekella. Üsna pea avastab ta, et käekell on väga eriline - see täidab kõik tema soovid! Äkitselt muutub Engel uskumatult populaarseks, aga kas tema uus elu teeb teda ikka päriselt õnnelikuks?(n)

programme.title: Buratino tegutseb jälle
65. Toome teieni tänased uudised
programme.desc: Selles osas on Buratino aasta puunukuks valimise puhul koos sõpradega kutsutud televisiooni hommikuprogrammi külaliseks. Ühtlasi otsustavad sõbrad ringi vaadata mujalgi telemajas ja eetrisse paisata omamoodi uudistesaate. Kaasa löövad Kaur Sinissaar, Kaia Skoblov, Marek Sadam, Vallo Toomla, Marko Reikop ja Andero Ermel, peaosades Priit Võigemast, Maria Soomets, Karol Kuntsel ja Anti Reinthal.(n)

programme.title: Miriami köögikombain
programme.desc: Miriam teeb jäätisekokteili ning ka kana on köögikombainist huvitatud, kuid lülitab valesid nuppe ja masin kukub põrandale puruks. Kuna Miriam on ametis triikimisega, jääb kana ise kombaini remontima. Režissöör Andres Tenusaar.(n)

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Kes ei teaks, millist muret võivad hambad teha. Postilehm Liselotte on hädas logiseva hambaga.(n)

programme.title: Oravametsa lood
programme.desc: Kevad on Oravametsas alati kiire aeg. Aga just siis, kui kõik näib olevat parimas korras, hakkavad oravaid tüütama väikesed vastikud kevadekuulutajad - kirbud.(n)

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Kevad on talvevarude kogumiseks parim aeg. Andy Bassich ja Denise lähevad jahile. Sue rajab aeda, Ricko DeWilde õpetab aga oma lastele traditsioonilisi jahipidamisviise.(n)

programme.title: Viis koostisosa – Jamie kiired ja lihtsad road
programme.desc: Tänases osas valmib Jamiel kleepuv baklažaan teriyaki’ga, luksuslik sitsiiliapärane tuunikalapasta, vürtsikas lillkapsariis veisehakklihaga ja tõeliselt stiilne soe sparglisalat munaga.(n)

programme.title: Loomade salaelu
programme.desc: Saabub öö ja loomaaia öise eluviisiga asukad hakkavad ärkama. Tuhnik näitab oma lihase õe vastu üles romantilist huvi ja kolitakse vaatamata vastuseisule Saksamaale. Merihobukestel on käes paaritumishooaja viimane täiskuu. Nad on ühed vähestest loomadest, kelle puhul isased poegivad. Kõige väiksemal isasel õnnestub näidata, mis puust ta tegelikult on.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja kümnendas osas sõidame mööda imeilusat Transalpina nime kandvat maanteed, seejärel leiame hiigelsuure korstna ja läheme avastame koledat mürgijärve. Koduteel kohtume vanade reisikaaslastega, kel uus reis alles alguses. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: On Guy Fawkesi öö ja Cathy korraldab ilutulestikuga pidu. Michael plaanib kolida Hispaaniasse ja Cathy tahab talle midagi öelda.(n)

programme.title: Suurte heliloojate klassikalised paigad
programme.desc: Norra, Taani, Rootsi, Saksamaa, London... Nagu Chopin, nii ei peljanud ka Edvard Grieg väljendada oma kunstis uudseid rahvustundeid. Tema loomingus on kuhjaga kodumaa atmosfääri, kauneid dramaatilisi maastikke ja rahvapärimusi, mis Norra kuulsaimat heliloojat kõige enam inspireerisid.(n)

programme.title: Advendikontsert Dresdeni Frauenkirches
Aus der Frauenkirche Dresden- Festliches Adventskonzert
programme.desc: Traditsiooniline advendikontsert Dresdeni Frauenkirches, kus ettekandele tuleb Mozarti, Händeli, Schuberti, Mendelssohn Bartholdy, Bruckneri ja Eccardi looming. Dresdeni Staatskapellet juhatab Andrés Orozco-Estrada.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Väike printsess peab aru, kuidas valmistada terve vannitäis õunamahla.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Mis saab siis, kui kuningas ja kuninganna otsustavad üheaegselt teisele üllatuse korraldada?(n)

programme.title: Tipsi ja Tim
programme.desc: Viimaks ometi tunnistasid arstid Tipsi terveks ja ta lubatakse koju. Kahjuks ei möödu kojuminek sekeldusteta.(n)

programme.title: Arva ära, kui palju ma sind armastan. Jõuluseiklus

programme.desc: Väike pähkelpruun jänku satub jõulude ajal seiklusesse - ta eksib metsa ära, kuid teeb kõik, et veeta jõulud koos oma lähedastega.(n)

programme.title: Pingviinipoeg Lolo seiklused
2.osa
programme.desc: Kolmest osast koosnev film pingviinipoeg Lolo seiklustest koos sõber Pepega kaunis ja ohtlikus Antarktikas. Klassikaks saanud lugu sõprusest ja vaprusest. Jaapani ja Sojuzmultfilmi meistrite koostöös 1987. aastal valminud multifilmi on Tallinnfilmile tõlkinud Valeeria Villandi, režissöör Arvo Kruusement, toimetaja Luule Žavoronok, näitlejad Ester Pajusoo, Mare Mander, Irja Aav, Hans Kaldoja, Kersti Kreismann, Maile Hiiet, Jaanus Orgulas, Ellu Puudist, Aksel Küngas, Andres Ots, Tõnu Mikiver ja Aksel Orav.(n)

programme.title: Engel
programme.desc: Engel on häbelik ja kohmakas 11-aastane tüdruk, kes ei suuda kunagi „ei“ öelda. Ühel päeval koju minnes juhtub temaga midagi kummalist - ta komistab, aga näoli kukkumise asemel hõljub äkitselt ilusas seebimullis. Kui mull katki läheb ja Engel on uimasena maas, leiab ta enda kõrvalt ilusa käekella. Üsna pea avastab ta, et käekell on väga eriline - see täidab kõik tema soovid! Äkitselt muutub Engel uskumatult populaarseks, aga kas tema uus elu teeb teda ikka päriselt õnnelikuks?(n)

programme.desc: Koolitants 2021 kunstilised juhid Linnar Looris ja Kadi Aare valisid sel aastal tantsude seast välja ka käesoleva festivali aasta parimad stiili- ja žanrinäited ehk nn signatuurtantsud. Saatejuht Inger, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.(n)

programme.title: Ületamatu loomariik
programme.desc: Inimene pole ainus liik, kes on sündinud ehitama, ja looduse arhitektid valdavad saladusi, mille lahtimuukimiseni on veel pikk tee. Koprad rajavad endale võimsaid elamuid, termiidid losse, mis püsivad sajandeid, ämblikud on tõelised kunstimeistrid... Kui enamik loomi lepib oma karmi keskkonnaga, siis osa neist otsustab ise, milline üks õige kodu peab olema.(n)

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: "Plekktrummi" stuudios süttivad tuled, et jätkata vestlusi inimestega, kes on ennast pühendanud kultuuri kujundamisele ja mõtestamisele. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.(n)

programme.title: Suurte heliloojate klassikalised paigad
programme.desc: Norra, Taani, Rootsi, Saksamaa, London... Nagu Chopin, nii ei peljanud ka Edvard Grieg väljendada oma kunstis uudseid rahvustundeid. Tema loomingus on kuhjaga kodumaa atmosfääri, kauneid dramaatilisi maastikke ja rahvapärimusi, mis Norra kuulsaimat heliloojat kõige enam inspireerisid.(n)

programme.title: Advendikontsert Dresdeni Frauenkirches
Aus der Frauenkirche Dresden- Festliches Adventskonzert
programme.desc: Traditsiooniline advendikontsert Dresdeni Frauenkirches, kus ettekandele tuleb Mozarti, Händeli, Schuberti, Mendelssohn Bartholdy, Bruckneri ja Eccardi looming. Dresdeni Staatskapellet juhatab Andrés Orozco-Estrada.(n)

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Vabadussõja etendus Kolga mõisas.(n)

programme.title: Jalgpalli Premium Liiga
programme.desc: Jalgpalli Premium Liiga finišisirgel kohtuvad valitsev meister Tallinna FC Flora ja Paide Linnameeskond. Otseülekannet kommenteerib Kristjan Kalkun, stuudios on Aet Süvari.(n)

programme.title: Berti päevik
Berts dagbok
programme.desc: Bert on 13-aastane poiss, kes läheb uues koolis kaheksandasse klassi. Samas klassis käib Leila noorem õde Amira. 15-aastast Leilat armastab terve kool. Samuti ka Bert, kes näeb võimalust Amira kaudu Leilaga tutvuda. Kui Bert leiab õdede kodust salajase päeviku, algab pöörane sõit armastuse, emotsioonide, reetmise ja südmevalu karussellil. Bert õpib viimaks kuulama oma südame häält ja tuleb sellest kõigest auga välja.(n)

programme.title: Prügihunt ja Superjänes
programme.desc: Keskkonnasõbralik nukuseriaal Superjänese ja Prügihundi eestvedamisel saab sedapuhku lumehangede vahel otsa! Loo kirjutas Wimberg, lavastas Vahur Keller, kunstnik Britt Urbla Keller, helilooja Tauno Aints. Kõikide nukkudega mängivad Tiina Tõnis, Mirko Rajas, Laura Nõlvak, Mihkel Tikerpalu ja Evgeny Moiseenko. Režissöör-lavastaja Salme-Riine Uibo, produtsent Margus Saar.(n)

programme.title: Koolitants 2021
programme.desc: Koolitants 2021 kunstilised juhid Linnar Looris ja Kadi Aare valisid sel aastal tantsude seast välja ka käesoleva festivali aasta parimad stiili- ja žanrinäited ehk nn signatuurtantsud. Saatejuht Inger, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.(n)

programme.title: Viis kildu Gunnar Grapsist
programme.desc: Teledokumentaalis, mis valmis rokiklassiku 60. sünniaastapäevaks, räägivad Gunnar Grapsist tema bändikaaslased Marc Chagall, Peter Koslovski, Andres Põldroo, sõjaväekaaslane Ivo Linna, filmirežissöör Raul Tammet ja tema isa Igor Graps. Autorid Jüri Muttika ja Margus Jõemägi.(n)

programme.title: Tartu muusikapäevad
Tartu IX muusikapäevad. Gunnar Grapsi Grupp
programme.desc: Tagasivaade Tartu IX muusikapäevadele. Esineb tolleaegne tippansambel "Gunnar Grapsi Grupp". Režissöör Peeter Brambat.(n)

programme.title: Soolo
programme.desc: Ulmefilmis on kasutatud eesti klassiku Peet Vallaku novelli "Lodjavahi surm" motiive, ühtlasi on see režissöör Raul Tammeti kursusetöö Nikita Mihhalkovi juhatatud stsenaristide ja režissööride kõrgematelt kursustelt Moskvas. Filmis tunneb teispoolsuse hõngu, mida vaataja võib aimata inimeste igapäevategevuste kaudu. Parvevahi karakteri kaudu astutakse ühe jalaga irreaalsusesse, jäädes teisega siiski pärismaailma. Kas ekraanil näidatav on filmitegelaste ettekujutuse vili või tegelikkus, sellest suurt aimu ei anta. Praktiliselt sõnatu filmi episoodilises tulnukarollis on ka Gunnar Graps, kes tegi teosele muusika. Vaikne ja äraviiv meditatsioon inimkonna tuleviku teemadel.(n)

programme.title: Kuva '88
programme.desc: Eestimaa heviveteran Gunnar Graps oma ansambliga G.G.G. Kontserdi salvestasid Raivo Suviste ja Valdeko Puulinn. Toimetaja Ulvi Funk.(n)

programme.title: Gunnar Graps. Trubaduur magistraalil
programme.desc: Vahur Kersna mastaapne teledokumentaal Eesti rocki leiutajast ning Nõukogude ühe popjumala elust, loomingust ja saatusest. Režissöör Margus Aasna, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa.(n)

programme.title: Pulmapilt
programme.desc: "Pulmapilt" on vist ainus eestlase poolt tehtud film, mis pretendeerib tõsiseltvõetava tulnukafilmi tiitlile pärast Kromanovi "Hukkunud Alpinisti hotelli" (1979). Filmi keskne tegelane on Rein Areni mängitud Ants, kes veedab üksinduses vanadusepäevi kindla elurütmi järgi. Ühel päeval leiab ta maja kõrvalt Tulnuka. Tulnukmees (Lembit Ulfsak) on ajarändur ja otsib teed tagasi oma aega. Temaga suheldes saab Antsule selgeks, et senisel ajamõistel pole mingit tähendust Suure Kõiksuse ees. Režissöör Raul Tammet, helilooja Gunnar Graps, kunstnik Epp Maria Kokamägi. Osades Rein Aren ja Lembit Ulfsak.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, the multinational OmniCorp is at the center of robot and weapon technology. When Alex Murphy, a loving father and a good cop is seriously injured, OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer. But Alex's life begins to change and turns upside down.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Two strangers are united by necessity and circumstances after their plane crashes, leaving the two stranded on a snowy mountain. As they struggle to deal with the harsh elements and their growing despair, they find strength in each other to make a difficult journey in search of rescue.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town and is found by Charlie, an 18 year old girl who is trying to find her place in the world. When Charlie revives him, she discovers that this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Now that a cure is found to treat mutations, X-Men are divided between Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a league of mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill finds himself chased by Ronan (Lee Pace) after stealing a mysterious orb. In order to evade Ronan, Peter must work with Gamora (Zoe Saldana), Rocket (Bradley Cooper), Drax (Dave Bautista) and Groot (Vin Diesel). Peter soon discovers the true power of the orb and the danger it poses to the entire universe.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vernon Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.(n)

programme.desc: A super hero works for civil security in Los Angeles, and due to his recklessness causes millions of dollars worth of damages which he then tries to make up for by improving his image.(n)

programme.desc: Baby Doll is detained in the mental hospital by her step-father. During an operation, she gets into a fantasy world in her head, where she attempts to escape her prison with four other girls and faces strange creatures.(n)

programme.title: Security
programme.desc: A security guard protects a woman from a ruthless gang that wants to kill her because she wants to testify against them.(n)

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: When his lover Kiriko is murdered, the young ninja Raizo turns his back on the orphanage that raised him and exacts his vengeance on those who killed her.(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.(n)

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: A clairvoyant magician is pursued by a counter-terrorism agent who wants him to use his ability to prevent a nuclear disaster. As his gift limits him to only seeing two minutes into the future, Cris is forced to flee with both the FBI and the terrorist close on his tail.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: After Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence) became the symbol of the revolution against the tyrannical Capitol system, and with the return of Peeta Mellark (Josh Hutcherson) to his comrades, Katniss with her revolutionary comrades enter a final battle against the Capitol and President Snow.(n)

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities. They both meet Mr. Glass who's masterminding a grand plan.(n)

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: During the American Civil War, Lt. John Dunbar befriends an Indian tribe and meets a white woman who was raised by them. He sheds his old ways as he comes to believe in their cause.(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In the 19th century America, deep in the uncharted American wilderness, hunter Hugh Glass is severely injured and left for dead. With sheer will as his only weapon, Glass must navigate a hostile environment, a brutal winter, and warring Native American tribes in a relentless quest to survive.(n)

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: During the Great Depression, the three Bondurant brothers get a bad reputation for their crimes in Virginia. An ambitious deputy wants a cut from their profits, and intends to turn their life into a living hell.(n)

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: A biopic that chronicles the FBI hunt of the infamous thief John Dillinger and two of his known associates, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd.(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: The film follows the true story of Whitey Bulger, the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who also happened to be the brother of a state senator, and became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.(n)

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities. They both meet Mr. Glass who's masterminding a grand plan.(n)

programme.title: John Carter
programme.desc: John Carter manages to escape prison in Virginia and hide in a cave, where he finds a magic locket that takes him to another planet. There, he comes in contact with green, tall, creatures who ask for his help to defeat their own enemies.(n)

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Sean Anderson goes off on a journey with his stepfather to find his grandfather, who is missing on a mythical island. They set out for the island of Palau where they meet a man and his daughter. Their helicopter crashes on the mysterious island. Sean finds his grandfather and adventure begins.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: Greg, an introvert child, struggles to deal with his family and his school, and suffers from his classmates. He decides to write about his experiences in a newspaper.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
programme.desc: When the Heffleys plan to go on a family trip to attend Meemaw’s 90th birthday, it goes horribly wrong after Greg leaves to go to a video game convention.(n)

programme.title: Casino Jack
programme.desc: This upcoming title is a film about the career of Washington lobbyist and convicted con man Jack Abramoff. In an investigation following a corruption scandal, Jack Abramoff was convicted of several charges including fraud and tax evasion. Several other Washington lobbyists and politicians were also convicted. The film stars Kevin Spacey as Jack Abramoff and Kelly Preston as Jack’s wife Pam.(n)

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Rupert Pupkin is an unsuccessful, aspiring comedian who finds an unusual way to get his moment in the he kidnaps his favorite talk show host to force him to give Punkin a chance to display his talent on his show.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: After a period of breakup, The Mystery Inc. meet at Spooky Island to investigate strange happenings taking place there. They decide to team up again to solve the mystery.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
programme.desc: A masked villain shows up at the opening of the Coolsville Museum of Criminology, stealing the costumes of the gang's most notorious villains. Now the Mystery Gang has to save Coolsville from the attack of the masked villains.(n)

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: With both her professional and personal life coming to a standstill, Emily decides to decompress by going on a vacation that she planned with her now former boyfriend. As she convinces her overprotective mother to accompany her, they soon find themselves in an adventure when they get kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: With his career going down the drain, a famous singer, Jack, manages to inspire a struggling artist, Ally, to persist in pursuing a singing career. Struggling with his own demons, Jack's newfound romance with Ally is put on the line with her star shining bright as his begins to dim.(n)

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Andrea recently graduated, and aspires to work in a fashion magazine, she accepts to work in one of the most famous magazines, but as a second assistant to the editor-in-chief Miranda, and in order to keep her job, Andrea must impress her tough and demanding boss.(n)

programme.desc: Twin brothers, Chad and Alex, are separated from each other after their parents are killed. Chad lives with a wealthy family in Paris, while Alex is a petty crook in Hong Kong. Chad accidentally meets his brother and persuades him to join him in the search for their parents' killer.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.(n)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(n)

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Ricky, a corrupt cop with the dream of becoming mayor, finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at a major boxing event. He tries to uncover the shocking murder plot, which becomes more shocking upon knowing its mastermind.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Five years after the first part, the wanted criminal (Riddick) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself facing the invasion of an empire called Necromongers, the army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.(n)

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.(n)

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Eva Lord (Eva Green) asks her ex-boyfriend Dwight (Josh Brolin) to help her escape her violent rich husband Damien Lord. But Dwight soon discovers that Eva's intention is full of evil and hatred. On the other hand, John Harrington (Bruce Willis) meets Nancy (Jessica Alba) and events escalate.(n)

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves on the wrong side of the law once again as they plan a heist to buy their freedom while being watched by a ruthless drug lord and a relentless federal agent.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi escape an aggressive attack during their quest for allies, and on their journey they come across the young boy, Anakin Skywalker, in whom they see a great talent that can restore balance to the Force.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: The Avengers and their allies continue to protect the world from the threats that cannot be dealt with alone. Thanos, a new tyrant from the cosmic shadows, spreads wrongdoing between galaxies; and his goal is to collect the six infinite stones to reach an unlimited force.(n)

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After T’Challa returns to his home in Wakanda to find himself king, he has to team up with CIA agent Everett K. Ross and members of the Wakandan special forces as “Black Panther” to prevent Wakanda from going into a war.(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A trained gang performs a bank heist in an organized manner, and a federal agent is assigned to negotiate with them. Another agent is assigned to protect valuable assets inside a bank safe, leading to a series of negotiations from several ends.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where crime rates have become insanely high, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products tries to create a prototype that is half-robot and half-human. When RoboCop learns about their intrigues, he turns on his masters.(n)

programme.title: Welcome to Sudden Death
programme.desc: As he accompanies his kids to a basketball match, Jesse, the security guard who was once a special forces officer, is in a predicament when he finds out about a group of technophile extremists who are holding a coach and his daughter captive inside the arena.(n)

programme.desc: Nikki and Leo find themselves in a difficult predicament when their romance faces an obstacle in the form of their respective fathers' rivalry over their competing pizzeria.(n)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: After she discovers that her father might be one of three old lovers of her mother's, a bride-to-be decides to secretly invite them to her wedding, in an attempt to find out who is her real father.(n)

programme.title: Just Go with It
programme.desc: Plastic surgeon Danny Maccabee fakes being married in order to enjoy future dates. He fabricates a web of lies with his assistant as she poses as his soon-to-be-ex-wife, but that apparently gets him into more trouble and pushes away his crush.(n)

programme.title: 100 Streets
programme.desc: The extraordinary stories of three different strangers who only share one thing: they live within the same hundred London streets. Is there any chance for them to cross paths.(n)

Vikings S6
programme.desc: In the wake of Ragnar Lothbrok's death, his sons split up after they avenge him. Two of them sail to the Mediterranean Sea as the rest stay behind to jointly rule their land in East Anglia. But trouble is on the horizon as the brothers are pitted against each other.(n)

programme.title: The Hummingbird Project
programme.desc: Vincent (Jesse Eisenberg) and Anton (Alexander Skarsgård) are two cousins from New York, and players in the high-stakes game of High- Frequency Trading, where winning is measured by milliseconds. They go head to head against their former boss, Torres (Salma Hayek), in a deal to build a straight fiber-optic cable line that could make them millionaires.(n)

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: John received Teddy, a stuffed bear, on his birthday when he was a little boy, and wished that he would become alive. Now, he has to maintain the balance between his relationship with Ted, and his relationship with his girlfriend, Lori.(n)

programme.title: 2 Days in Paris
programme.desc: In an attempt to breathe some life back into their relationship, Marion and Jack decide to leave New York for a trip across Europe. But little do they know that their stay in Paris will be complicated by the presence of Marion's overbearing parents, as well as the appearance of several of her old flames.(n)

programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.(n)

programme.title: A Dog's Breakfast
programme.desc: Patrick is a single man who lives with his dog Mars. When his sister visits to introduce him to her TV star fiancé, things spiral out of control when Patrick thinks that he might've killed him by mistake.(n)

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: As the high school student Scott Howard struggles to fit in, his life takes a surprising turn when he finds out that he's a werewolf. But as he starts to become popular at school, he has to deal with his unusual nature.(n)

programme.title: Larry Crowne
programme.desc: Middle-aged Larry Crown loses his job, and decides that he wants to start over and go back to college. He meets Mercedes, his professor, who leads a disappointing life with her husband. Fate brings them together, and Larry finally begins to fall in love with life again.(n)

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: A barbershop in Chicago is a place where plenty of interesting situations happen between the customers and the hairdressers at the barbershop, where each have their own dreams that they strive to reach in many different ways.(n)

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The three Musketeers team up with the lively D'Artagnan to defeat the forces of evil and stop the many attempts to seize the French throne.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.(n)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Chuck works at a large courier company, and is in love with his girlfriend, Kelly. He plans to propose to her on Christmas, but is required to go to Malaysia for an urgent work assignment. The plane he's on crashes on the way, leaving Chuck as the only survivor on a deserted island, where it is up to him to protect both his own body and his own mind, by holding on to dreams of getting back.(n)

programme.title: City Slickers
programme.desc: A man facing a midlife crisis joins his two friends as they go on a cattle drive across the Southwest. Their journey reveals to them more about themselves and helps them conquer their fear of aging.(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Carlito is sentenced five years in prison. Later on he repents his crimes and becomes a straight person, but everyone around him tries to get him back to break the law. Among those are his nephew who commits a crime and asks him to cover it up, as well as a group of gangsters who believe he murdered their leader, and are trying to take revenge on him. He must take care of all those troubles before starting a new life.(n)

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Forced to choose between jail or community service, two men find themselves enrolled in a Big Brother program where they are entrusted with a teenager who is suffering the pangs of love and another fifth-grader with severe behavioral issues.(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Hoping to reinvent himself as a writer, Truman Capote seeks information about a brutal murder in Kansas to use as the basis for his new novel In Cold Blood. However, he unexpectedly finds himself forming a friendship with one of the killers.(n)

programme.title: Throw Momma from the Train
programme.desc: Miserable literature teacher and author Larry and his no-less-miserable student Owen make a bizarre deal; Larry is to kill Owen’s overbearing mother, whereas Owen is to kill Larry’s evil ex-wife.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther 2
programme.desc: Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Steve Martin) returns after solving the mystery of the Pink Panther Diamond, his angry boss Dreyfus tries to keep him in minor cases, but the rare diamond is stolen again with other artifacts around the world. A team of the greatest detectives is formed to retrieve these things and Clouseau is among them.(n)

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.(n)

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.(n)

programme.desc: A group of British retired seniors plan a trip to India for rest and recreation in a luxury Hotel, they discover that the hotel is not as advertised. But manage to find beauty and magic in an unexpected way.(n)

programme.desc: Adam and Emma keep crossing ways over the course of fifteen years. Eventually, Emma becomes a doctor, and Adam is trying to fulfill his dream of becoming a writer. After spending a night together, Emma starts to contemplate whether she wants a noncommittal physical relationship, or more than that.(n)

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.(n)

programme.title: Devil in a Blue Dress
programme.desc: Easy Rawlins, a jobless African-American WWII old-timer, lives a wretched life until he meets Dewitt Albright, who hires him to find a runaway lady residing in LA's Black community. Rawlins accepts the offer because he needs money, only to discover that this woman is Daphne Monet, the noble-born Todd Carter's fiancée.(n)

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: A new student must find someone to date the most depressing girl in school, in order to take her little sister, who he likes, on a date, who's not allowed to date anyone till her older sister is on a date first.(n)

programme.title: House At The End Of The Street
programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia, find a baby in a lifeboat. After they adopt the child, they learn later that a boat accident occurred at the same time they found the child and a woman tells them that she lost her husband and her child that day.(n)

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Claire Bartel is assaulted by Dr. Mott, and she reports it to the Police, which makes him kill himself. Shocked by what happened, his pregnant wife Peyton has a miscarriage. She poses as a nanny for the Bartel family, wanting to tear their life apart.(n)

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor
programme.desc: The couple Perry and Gail are on a holiday to save their marriage, they encounter a Russian millionaire who is involved with the mafia. He asks for their help to have an informal alliance with the British intelligence services in exchange for exposing corruption that runs deep in London.(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: When a politician crosses paths with a ballerina, he becomes smitten, the thing that brings about the wrath of the agents of Fate as they try to keep the couple apart. The man then tries to pass through traceable doors so he makes an outage while holding his beloved's hands.(n)

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) is enraged when she discovers her boyfriend (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) is married. She teams up with his wife (Leslie Mann) and another mistress of his (Kate Upton) to plot their revenge.(n)

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: The lives of five couples as they deal with the changes that come with impending parenthood, through the story of Alex who joins a support group after his wife surprises him with her desire to adopt a child.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.(n)

programme.title: Finding Love in Mountain View
programme.desc: Margaret is shocked when the news of her estranged cousin's death comes with the reveal that her cousin has picked her as her children's custodian. As she moves to Moutain View to look after the children, the move heralds the start of a new chapter in her life.(n)

programme.title: Pirates in Callao
programme.desc: Alberto, gets lost on a school trip to a fort called El Real Felipe in Callao, and he enters a portal that sends him to the 17th century. He discovers that Dutch pirates will attack Callao under Jacques L'Hermite, who wants to steal the king's gold and invade Callao.(n)

programme.title: Khan Kluay 2

programme.desc: Life on planet Krazzy,is full of fun and prosperity,until a galaxy tyrant decides to invade the planet. Two brave heroes team up with a scientist to confront the invasion attemptpt to show the true essence of the people of planet Krazzy.(n)

programme.desc: Middle-aged and unemployed (Brennan) and (Dale),are staying in their parents homes. Until the father of one of them decides to marry the other's mother, so they find themselves forced to live together in one house. They have to work together to find a job.(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil 3: Extinction
programme.desc: As her fight against the Umbrella Corporation continues, Alice runs into the other survivors from Raccoon City. Together, they brave the zombie-infested terrain as they fight for survival and to bring down the head of the Umbrella Corporation, Albert Wesker.(n)

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Matt dumps Jenny, who is on the needy side, she uses her superpowers to make his life miserable.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Being the first human being born on Mars, Gardner Elliot reads a lot about Earth, his mother's planet. After 16 years, he is eager to visit Earth to get to experience its wonders himself, hoping to learn how he came into being. Meanwhile, he strikes an online friendship with a girl on Earth.(n)

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: After Dwayne and Travis failed to get the money to open a massage parlor, they kidnap a pizza delivery man and make him wear a vest with time bomb, and force him to steal the $ 100,000 needed to finance their project within 10 hours.(n)

programme.title: Little Manhattan
programme.desc: When Gabe reunites with his former kindergarten classmate Rosemary, he quickly finds himself developing a crush on her. As he tries to figure out how to woo her, his new feelings leave him as confused as his parents' imminent divorce.(n)

programme.desc: Cody Maverick is a teenage penguin, who is looking forward to the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship. He wants to win the challenging competition, and along his journey meets the wise Geek, who teaches him a thing or two about life.(n)

programme.title: Please Stand By
programme.desc: Wendy is a brilliant young woman with autism living in a group home in the care of Scottie who helps her to control her anger fits. Her sister, Audrey, visits her but refuses Wendy’s request to take her home, fearing for her baby, Ruby.
